name: see you soon
description:
see you soon

This is just a tiny game I created in rpg maker. It's about someone who wandered off too far and is trying to get back home. It's very sappy, hope you enjoy it!

I made the music and sfx myself and you can get the music here if you want you don't have to just be nice to me thx: https://hnky.bandcamp.com/album/see-you-soon

I made most of the sprites with the help of a random sprite generator: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/771133

Installation instructions: only for windows sorry apple people

purchase winrar and unpack the rar file press exe have fun
